syl20a wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> Thanks for your answer.
> 
> --- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Gordon Mohr <gojomo@...> wrote:
>> The problem isn't with your shutdown; rather there's a bug preventing 
>> settings of NotMatchesListRegExpDecideRule from being recognized.
>>
>> (I presume you added your root:scope:rules:7:regexp-list value by 
>> hand-editting the sheet, because the same bug should prevent the web UI 
>> from showing an option to edit that value.)
> 
> In fact the option is present in the web UI after a first crawl

Hmm, did you initially add the rule via the web UI?

>> If not, I recommend sticking with 1.14.x releases until 2.2 comes
> out -- 
> 
> OK. Are the ARC file formats identical between 1.14 and 2.0 versions ?
> I wrote a bunch of scripts for Heritrix' 2 arc files.

Yes, both the ARC and WARC formats should be identical between 1.14.2 
and 2.0.2.

- Gordon @ IA
